website_summaries.verdict: A quality Apple Watch charger from Belkin that quickly and reliably charges both companion Apple devices at the same time, while orienting them high on its base for extra visibility.
pros: Charges your iPhone and Apple Watch simultaneously
Adjustable to fit most iPhone cases
Delivers a much faster recharge time than the standard charger
cons: Charging your Apple Watch wirelessly is great, but it would’ve been nice to have the option for your iPhone too

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this charging dock two and a half months ago and it just quit charging both the watch and the phone. I cannot return it because the return window was only for one month and the support window was for only two months so I guess I'm just out the money. I have purchased Belkin items before and never had an issue so I am very disappointed and will not be purchasing their items again.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Taliani

customer_reviews.title: Nice Charge Dock! Add a rotation piece to turn apple watch into bedside mode!
customer_reviews.text: iPhone 7 plus and apple watch 2. Love this stand, hefty and stable. The adjustable lightning adapter makes it easy to dial in a good fit for your phone depending on the case you have, i have the spec clear case and it works great. The only upgrade i wish they would make would be to allow the watch to turn side ways into bed side mode. I don't have a clock on my nightstand so it would be cool to use the watch as the clock. otherwise it works great, charges fast, easy to install and looks clean on the bedside table.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bowling

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: 6 months later it doesn’t work anymore. It’s behaves like a ripped cord charges for 3 seconds and then off 3 seconds except with this you can’t adjust the cord to make it stick and it wasn’t 20 bucks it was very expensive and was treated well
customer_reviews.author: Angiev

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After 3 Months
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these a couple of months ago for my girlfriend and myself. It's a nice docking station when working, and it looks really sleek. However, after less than three months of use, the iPhone charger on one of the docks has completely stopped working. Unfortunately, I am no longer eligible for product support, which seems absurd given the very short time in which this product failed and its price. Although the dock is great when working, I cannot recommend it due to the seeming lack of reliability / quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Carson Young

customer_reviews.title: Functional, Practical, and Fashionable
customer_reviews.text: This charger is functional, practical, and fashionable. Really adds to decor on night stand or end table. Drape iWatch over charging pod, settle IPhone onto lighting connector and lean iPhone backwards. Then you lean back and relax their both charging to a complete full charge. Yes you can, when both iPhone and iWatch are fully charged, gently turn off both devices and leave on charger. Obviously gently so that you don’t restart charging cycle which wakes up iPhone or iWatch. If after charged I don’t need one or the other I simply turn off device and leave on stand so that it’s handy (meaning I know where it is) when needed.
customer_reviews.author: N8860

customer_reviews.title: This iteration of the duo dock solves the problem with the original, a thin shaft that broke easily
customer_reviews.text: The best dual iPhone/Apple Watch charging dock I have used, and I have tried a few. With built-in lighting charger cables, you can use the ones that came with your devices for other purposes such as traveling with a charger. The original Belkin PowerHouse dock had a thin upright shaft that held the charger for the Apple Watch. Mine broke at the base after a brief period, and this design solved that problem. If you are looking for a nightstand dock for your iPhone and Watch, I strongly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Update. It charges quickly. It’s faster than my other stand. This dock is very cool. It’s a great design compared to some other models. It takes up little space on my dresser and declutters all the chords. I just wish the ac adaptor chord was longer. I love how it has the built in chargers. I ordered it at 1am and received by 8pm the same day at no additional charge.
customer_reviews.author: kewya

customer_reviews.title: Obsolete product
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of the PowerHouse docks for my wife and I. I upgraded to the iPhone XS Max and my charger is now obsolete. I've noted that some bought theirs in the past couple of months and I hear about others getting a 20% off discount towards a new version. I don't want to buy a new one, I want mine to work or have it replaced free. What do I do with my old one other than throw it away ($100) after about a year of use. This is an engineering failure by Belkin.
customer_reviews.author: cal

customer_reviews.title: Great for nightstand organization, mornings are much smoother.
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my nightstand. Incredibly better than chasing wires for phone and watch. I'm not sure why I waited so long to buy something like this. The dock wheel to extend the lightning charger is a great little idea, sometimes it's hard to line up and dock it but that's not a problem with the dock, the lightning port is small. It seems expensive but keep in mind that you get another phone and watch charger. I would buy again, especially if it was on sale further. The new more expensive model has better color options.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff K.

customer_reviews.title: This dock simply stopped working after less than two months of use
customer_reviews.text: This dock simply stopped working after less than two months of use. Unacceptable. When attempting to remove the phone from the connector, it was very difficult to do with one hand. I wish I had not wasted my money on this dock.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Lewing

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an iPhone 7+ & 38mm Apple Watch!
customer_reviews.text: I have an iPhone 7 plus with a case and was a little worried that my phone would be too big for the dock. But it fits perfectly and charges with the cable provided. This is a great way to eliminate extra cables on your nightstand. Like another reviewer mentioned, if you lay the watch sideways, it turns on bedside mode.
customer_reviews.author: Sharmila

customer_reviews.title: Great product but returned and bought the wireless upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Don’t bother if you use a case with your iPhone. The Apple Watch stand is the best part, but trying to charge the phone is a nightmare with the case. The stand doesn’t work well with the case because of the angle of the stand (makes the case lean forward just enough to fall forward. Dock works really well without the case. Biggest problem for me is that I use my phone in the middle of the night in the dark as a night light to tend to our little one - this didn’t work well. Need something so easy I can do it “blind.”
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: It is a very good looking dock
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good looking dock, however, I suspect that since I started using it, the battery of the iPhone is loosing power faster than before, and the original charger of the apple watch started having issues "of compatibility" with the watch, so be careful and do more research before you get it
customer_reviews.author: jpablotr

customer_reviews.title: My Husband Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this thing! I gave it to him for Christmas and he's so happy that it doesn't take up a ton of room on his bed stand. He used to have to find the cord to charge his watch wherever it fell, then find his phone charger and then find space to lay them down while they charge and lay the phone on a piece of cloth so it doesn't wake us up in the middle of the night, vibrating. Ugh. This thing takes care of all of it and it a very quality piece of equipment with some weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: Love Amazon!

customer_reviews.title: Dock stops working like all the other reviews say
customer_reviews.text: Just abruptly stopped working and sat in same place in same outlet for last year no problem. Loved it while it worked! Belkin sucks for making this a mess that has to be thrown away how unsatisfied I am with them. And I did reach out to them where they wanted my receipt I did give it to them but keep asking for it. I just gave up they’re not willing to support you they just give the run-around
customer_reviews.author: sharpcheddar

customer_reviews.title: It charges the watch just fine, but it would not charge my iPhone 7 ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product about six months ago. It charges the watch just fine, but it would not charge my iPhone 7 or my 8 Plus. I have adjusted the lightning plug completely through it’s range with the cases on and off to no avail. I just don’t understand why something from such a credible company could not work. Judging by other reviews I’m not the only one to suffer this issue. I cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Kessler

customer_reviews.title: It comes with it's own power cable!
customer_reviews.text: High marks on the fact this comes with it's own power cable an adapter! All other other one you have to provide your own cable. So you are just buying a mold or some facy paper weight for your device to sit on. This has it own cable, so you would use your own as spare for travel. Charging is pretty fast. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T. Nguyen-tu

customer_reviews.title: Take your time in aligning the charger with the opening in your phone case. Don't force it.
customer_reviews.text: I really like being able to charge both my phone and watch from one charging device. Charging the watch is super easy, just lay it on the pad. Attaching the phone, when in a case, is a bit more challenging. Most if the time a bit of fiddling is necessary to line the charging nub with the hole in the case. Once inserted, all is good. It's also very attractive. I set it on the night stand next to my bed, and can easily touch the phone to check a message, set the alarm, answer a call, without having to fumble around.
customer_reviews.author: LuckeeD0g

customer_reviews.title: Very solid sturdy product that comes with one wire only unlike most ...
customer_reviews.text: Very solid sturdy product that comes with one wire only unlike most which have a wire for each charging item. However I will be returning this product because it is hard to insert the phone into the lightning socket at the first try and especially trying to put the phone back to charge in the middle of the night when its dark in the room takes a few tries... I will be trying the wireless charging stations next.
customer_reviews.author: Henriette

customer_reviews.title: The BEST docking solution!
customer_reviews.text: A great product! It is heavy, very well made, sleek, and it has all the connectors built right in. This docking station help cut down clutter and messy cords on our bedside tables, and charges the two devices quickly. I was reluctant to spend so much on a docking station, but now I am glad I did because it really is high quality and can be used with most phone cases. Its a winner in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Saimaa

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 6 months!
customer_reviews.text: Quit working completely after 6 months. Rarely used in our vacation home Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Tutu

customer_reviews.title: I would have loved it had it worked
customer_reviews.text: I would have loved it had it worked! It's beautifully made and solved the problem of a bunch of cords all over the place - but although it charged my phone - the watch charger didn't work. I tried waiting awhile, then tried adjusting my watch - it wouldn't charge! Sent it back. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: D J

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much my husband bought one...but then
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in October so it hasn't even been a year. I loved it so much at first. So convenient to have right next to my bed at night...get both phone and watch charged overnight. However, lately it's been charging for a few seconds, then not, then charging again, etc. After a couple minutes of taking it off and trying to put it back on, it would work. Now, it won't work at all. It just keeps popping on for a few seconds then popping back off. It won't keep charging. I'm really disappointed because I paid good money for this and expect it to work longer than 10 months.
customer_reviews.author: aboyn3girls

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with my Iphone 8 plus or Xs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this several months ago because the 1st gen model of this charger just wouldn't work at all with the newer phone. It never really worked charging my iphone 8 plus that well. It would charge for an hour then not charge at all. I just got my new iphone xs today and it will not work at all with this one. It immediately made my new phone super hot and would not charge. This is the second Belkin charge with the apple watch charging station I've bought. It's not worth it. It's super expensive and it won't last. Belkin's quality has gone wayyyyy downhill.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID MCNELEY

customer_reviews.title: Seems great, but the watch charger is spotty and works ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems great, but the watch charger is spotty and works about half the time, not sure if its not being held in position or if the charging coils don't work well. I put it on at night, the watch indicates its being charged and I wake up with 10% battery. The watch dock is the main selling point of this charger in my opinion and it was sub-par. Actually kind of an outlier for a Belkin product, not sure what happened in this design. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: eficker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Charging Dock
customer_reviews.text: The power dock is perfect for what I wanted. What I like best is that only one power cord (that is included) is all that is needed. I’ve had it now for a few weeks, and found it works perfectly. I have a case on my phone and have had no issues with it being able to charge. The tie I have around the cord was not included, but was bought here on Amazon. Anyway I was lucky and got the dock while it was on a sale (over the holidays), but still would be worth the full price, it cleans up the area nicely.
customer_reviews.author: sccergirl22

customer_reviews.title: A top choice for combination docks
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy weighted dock - Aesthetically pleasing and convenient. Pivoting lightning connector is a smart design choice and will prolong the life of this dock drastically. The price is a bit high ($99 at the time of writing) but it will likely drop exponentially as time goes on, still one of the best options regardless.
customer_reviews.author: RCodispoti

customer_reviews.title: Extremely annoying charging connection!!
customer_reviews.text: This stand would be 5 star if the iPhone charging was wireless. The iPhone charging connection is difficult to connect to especially if you have any type of case on your phone. Do not spend your money on this! It is late night frustration every dam day trying to make the connection to charge using this. The designer on this failed!!
customer_reviews.author: Mumtoo2

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with my iPhone Xs Max
customer_reviews.text: I used this with my older iPhone for several months and I liked not having cords out to charge my phone and watch, but now I have upgraded my iPhone to the Xs Max and Apple Watch 4. It works fine for charging my new Apple Watch but it will not charge the iPhone Xs Max. The screen flashes on and there is an audible tone every 20 seconds or so.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Whitacre

customer_reviews.title: Love the feminine characteristics and exceptional design
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how stylish this charging station is in my bedroom... It appears very feminine so I keep it close to my bed. I tried putting it in the kitchen but I found myself being distracted and burned my baked beans putting the watch on the stand... taking it off.. Thankfully nothing else burned... and i've learned my lesson.. keeping the Dock in the bedroom.. Delivery was FAST
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Nice while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I really did love this charger, it was convenient to have my chargers bundled neatly on my nightstand! But 4 months after purchasing, it stopped working completely. Sadly couldn't troubleshoot much beyond making sure it was plugged in on both ends, and Belkin only offers support for 90 days. For the price tag, I expected it to last a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: I love having one place to charge both my phone and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love having one place to charge both my phone and watch. I hate how difficult it is to plug my phone into the stupid dongle. I gave one to my wife and she hates it even more. Overall I’ll tolerate it for the simplicity of just having one unit but it could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Richins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous. I would recommend to anyone with an Apple Watch. The watch charging cords are always falling off my table and taking my watch with it, this is so safe and really substantial. It even looks nice on my table and reduces my cords.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha H.

customer_reviews.title: Belkin PowerHouse dock does not charge iPhone consistently
customer_reviews.text: I loved that you could charge an iPhone and Apple Watch at the same time - which is the wholeness point of this product. However, I just got the new iPhone XS Max and charging the phone is really finicky. Sometimes it charges, but most of the time, it only charges for a few seconds then it doesn’t charge, and then it goes back and forth. However, there doesn’t appear to be any issues charging my Series 2 Apple Watch. I’m pretty disappointed that a $100 product doesn’t work consistently even though this item is advertised as “MFI” on the box.
customer_reviews.author: alvinator

customer_reviews.title: Died after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: This product was great until both broke and stopped charging within 1 month of each other, about 27 months after I bought them. One had the watch charger broke. One had both chargers break. I haven’t had any electrical issues in the house or problems with other plug in devices, so this seems like it just reachend of life.
customer_reviews.author: moo

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to plug in your phone!
customer_reviews.text: I love how it charges my Apple Watch. Just put it on the circle, done, easy! Also, like not having all the chargers and cords on my night stand. Why only two stars? It is very very difficult to place my phone on the charger. I have a thin case but the charge plug moves around and every night I have to pick it up and try to maneuver the phone around to attach it!! Very frustrating! For that reason I would not recommend this product. Seems like you could make it much easier to plug in your phone. I really wanted to like this charger, but am unhappy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good  but one major flaw
customer_reviews.text: This works very well except it is a challenge every night to fit the female charging port of my phone onto the male plug on the platform, because it is so flexible. It got a bit easier as I've been getting used to it, but still a problem. This needs a small design modification.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Samuels

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Liked this unit until one day it just stopped working. We tested different outlets with different phones and watches and it seems like the dock just stopped working. Its odd because the unit has never moved locations and we haven't had any power issues. Belkin usually makes a good product guess I will have to switch brands as this was an expensive product and should not stop working.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Does not work correctly
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these (one for husband and one for myself) for the new iPhone XS and the iPhone XS plus. Works great for charging the watch when the phone is not charging. One you add the phone, the charger goes back and forth between charging and not charging. This makes the phone screen go on and off continuously. Did this with both mine and my husbands. Maybe works better with the previous version iPhones. It is nicely made and would be very convenient if it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon R Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Stopped fully charging my phone after 6 months!
customer_reviews.text: This has a great design. It looks cool and is very functional. However, mine stopped fully charging my phone after 6 months. After having it plugged in overnight my phone was only at 80%. I’m very disappointed. For over $100 this should last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: David Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months!!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for about 2 months and it stopped working yesterday. It keeps connecting and disconnecting. Never moved the charger.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great product, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! I received it as a gift at Christmas 2017. It still works wonderfully (6 months later)!! I really like that I only need to use one plug even though I’m charging two separate devices (iPhone and Apple Watch). It doesn’t take up much space and I don’t have to worry about tangled cords. No complaints here. Satisfied customer :)
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Ovens

customer_reviews.title: Does not connect to USB, just a charger
customer_reviews.text: To expensive to be to dumb, it does not connect to USB so iphone can't connect to your PC. It only comes with a 110v transformer to provide power directly, a dumb charger.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this Charge Dock a few months now and I am completely satisfied with it. It is solid, well built and definitely seems like a product that I will have for a very long time. To this point I have no complaints with it whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Big Hen

customer_reviews.title: Great Belkin Product
customer_reviews.text: I just got an apple watch and my bf is always stealing my charges so I purchased this. I LOVE IT! I think the price is a bit steep and the iphone charging part has to be scrolled all the way up for my phone to go on easily, but this was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This less expensive device works better than the more expensive Belkin sold in the Apple ...
customer_reviews.text: This less expensive device works better than the more expensive Belkin sold in the Apple stores. I had to return that one because the connection to the iPhone was so erratic. This one has worked flawlessly!
customer_reviews.author: JoJoBean

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an anniversary gift for my husband, and he loves it! Works perfectly on his desk so while he's working, he can charge both his phone and watch at the same time without taking up too much desk space.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnte

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: The best charging station. Don't waste your time or money on any other product. This one fits most cases and includes everything you need to charge the phone and watch at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Product for two years the charging of the phone Doc no longer works
customer_reviews.text: I have use this Product for two years the charging of the phone Doc no longer works
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Phone upgrade made this obsolete. Do not buy if.....
customer_reviews.text: If you purchase the new iPhone XS, this is now a worthless piece of plastic. I would love a refund! I was not aware that this would not work until the launch of the new iphone.
customer_reviews.author: rhondamarie

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but nice
customer_reviews.text: This was a bit of a splurge but it is sleek, works well, and Belkim chargers are next best thing to original Good for nightstand or computer desk. Frees up my other Apple Watch charger to take with me if needed
customer_reviews.author: MzMelinda

customer_reviews.title: Charging port is designed poorly. Hard to get the phone plugged in.
customer_reviews.text: It's tricky to get my iphone on the charger. Usually takes a few tries. It's too bad it's not designed to put the iphone on the dock easily.
customer_reviews.author: J.J. LOU

customer_reviews.title: Why did it quit charging my iPhone 8s Plus?
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly...then nothing. Out of the blue one day, my phone gave me some sort of message that said basically that the device was not compatible. Now I don't even get that message. I have to use the original charger cube to charge my phone. Watch charger still works perfectly. Any solutions or did I just flush money down the toilet?
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Totally happy with this purchase. Charges quickly. Update---- 4 months after purchase- product stopped working. However, this product is under a 2 year warranty from belkin and they have offered to replace the item.
customer_reviews.author: natalie m.

customer_reviews.title: Won’t charge an iPhone XS Max
customer_reviews.text: Starts to charge, then immediately stops. Charges an 8 Plus just fine. XS Max charged fine on other old charges, just not this one. Wouldn’t recommend Belkin chargers if they won’t work on future phones.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Klida

customer_reviews.title: It got demoted to the garage for when husband takes off his Apple Watch to work on equipment
customer_reviews.text: Awkward for bedside table and takes up too much space. It got demoted to the garage for when husband takes off his Apple Watch to work on equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Spoon

customer_reviews.title: Only usefull if you're from the UK
customer_reviews.text: When I recieved it it only had the UK power head, and I need the EUpower head... it is realy a pain in the a** to not have the chance to use it, becuase of a small detail. It said there whould be powerheads for UK,US and EU, but I could only find UK. I would love to have the change to get the other power outlet, as I was promised
customer_reviews.author: Frederik

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to dock phone at night
customer_reviews.text: This product works well for holding the watch but terrible for docking the phone. In the dark at night is almost impossible to place your phone successfully into the lightning charger port.
customer_reviews.author: Jdawg Bizzle

customer_reviews.title: Traveler must
customer_reviews.text: Take it with when traveling. The phone power jack can be difficult to use with some cases.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well with otterbox cases
customer_reviews.text: The otterbox defender case does not fit with this charger. It doesn’t stick out far enough. With the commuter, you have to turn your phone facing the backrest instead of facing out
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Does what you need it to do. Little pricey compared to other competitor products but looks nicer and does not look like it’s made of cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit my phone with a case on it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with the durability of this charger only reason I didn't give it more stars is because my phone doesn't fit on it with its case.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Not for IPhone X
customer_reviews.text: It says compatiable with iPhone X but did not work for me. It started giving me the “this accessory may not be supported” message the first time I plugged it in. I did buy a used one for. Also the plug in for the iPhone was very loose I don’t know if it should be like that. I read the reviews and saw pictures of iPhone X charging I thought this was going to work :/
customer_reviews.author: L.Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Died after just a year
customer_reviews.text: Sadly will not consistently charge anything anymore. Have tested multiple devices and the charging continually cycles on and off, on and off. No good.
customer_reviews.author: Scott from Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: This charging dock looks great and works perfectly with iPhone and Watch
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived in one day! Thank you Amazon. This charging dock looks great and works perfectly with iPhone and Watch. Very pleased with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, didn't expect anything less from Belkin
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, didn't expect anything less from Belkin. Exactly what I was looking for to keep both products together without the cord hassle. Adjustable plug so it'll fit pretty much any case. Definetly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. U

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Only has 1 cable to plug into the wall so you don't have a ton of wires everywhere. The watch stand is perfect. The phone plug adjusts with a little wheel on the back so if you have a big phone case or something it will adjust. Love. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne Geck

customer_reviews.title: Heavy , Watch Charing Unit Included
customer_reviews.text: It is including apple watch charging unit (white coin like). The included adapter is needed to charge. It is heavier that I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Donghyeon, Kim

customer_reviews.title: Paperweight.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for years. But their decision to turn it into a paper weight is disgusting. No reason for it to be incompatible with the new phones.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bonser

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It's Belkin so it is made very well. Have not had any issues with it and the charge on both the iphone and the apple watch is very quick. I would recommend for sure
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Belkin Charge Dock
customer_reviews.text: This charger was a gift for my son. He indicated that it works as advertised and he loves the convenience of being able to charge both his iPhone 7+ and his watch at the same time. Charger is small enough to easily pack for trips.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: if you have both of the items then you need ...
customer_reviews.text: if you have both of the items then you need this charging station. Comes ready to go, the cheaper ones require you to use your own cables - not this one; this one comes with the cables installed.
customer_reviews.author: booga flakes

customer_reviews.title: N/A
customer_reviews.text: Did not travel with it, but it worked great and was super easy to charge all my apple devices that I use daily.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Branton

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your time and money
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money! Sold as a high end product. I have always struggled to plug the phone and connect it seamlessly. Always had to plug and unplug a few times to make it work. But most frustrating part - simply stopped working out of the blue. Lousy product not worth the big money you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Pirino

customer_reviews.title: Quit working
customer_reviews.text: I bought 1 of those in Best Buy last December after purchasing apple watch. It quit working after 10 months. I see many reviews like that. I wish I didn't look at them before my purchase. Definetly product that I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marcin Rutkowski

customer_reviews.title: Dock station for both watch and cell phone.
customer_reviews.text: Quick charge for both Apple Watch and iPhone. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: James Sy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as a birthday present and I have to say he loves it! Works great and love the fact that he can charge his phone and watch at the same time. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Klamer Gray

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product while it lasted. Like how you can adjust the lightning port to be compatible with various cases and that the iwatch magnetic charger was built in leaving the one that came with it available for travel. BUT, It just stopped working after a year of use.
customer_reviews.author: C Talbert

customer_reviews.title: Won’t charge iPhone XS
customer_reviews.text: Worked great with my iPhone 6S. It will *not* charge my iPhone XS. It starts charging and then a couple seconds later it stops. Then it’ll start again and stop again. Still charges my watch fine and it’ll charge my wife’s 7. Just not my XS.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Michael Golabowski

customer_reviews.title: Last forever
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. But the phone charger itself is hard to line up on the phone so you sit and dink around trying to get the charger in the hole. But other than that very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Shae Connell

customer_reviews.title: LASTED 3.5 YEARS
customer_reviews.text: Amazing charging stand that lasted me 3.5 years. Unfortunately it has now died and I'm sad to see it go, especially for the price, but at least it lasted me that long!!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Grabow de Almeida

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly annoying!!
customer_reviews.text: 3 months later it no longer charges my phone. Incredibly annoying!!! Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: 2Rud3

customer_reviews.title: Device last 3-5 months before not charging
customer_reviews.text: I am about to be on my 3rd device in 13 months. The charging port for the phone goes bad after 4-5 months and have to reach out to Belkin to get a new one sent. Belkin stands behind their product which is a PLUS but the actual device does not last.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan J.

customer_reviews.title: She likes it.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my gf and she really likes it. She was always misplacing one or the other.
customer_reviews.author: Lilbillymac

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent concept and product but quality was honestly awful for the money spent. Only lasted 3 short months and then would not connect and charge phone. Not easy to get on and off dock which was frustrating as well. Definitely would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: I gave it to my daughter for her watch and phone and she loved it. So it's all good
customer_reviews.text: Not the charger I was looking for and not really what I was looking for but it's ok. I gave it to my daughter for her watch and phone and she loved it. So it's all good.
customer_reviews.author: Geneva Miller

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 1/2 years
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a year and a half and all of a sudden it stopped working. For no reason it just wouldn’t charge anymore. I would unplug it and then plug it back. But there seemed to have no more electrical current because it would not charge my phone nor my Apple Watch.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I love this charger
customer_reviews.text: I love this charger. I keep it next to my bed at home, and take it with me when traveling. It's a great tool for staying organized and keeping my devices charged. Charges the Apple watch very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ann Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Far better charging capability than the cheaper ones
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and organized. Far better charging capability than the cheaper ones.
customer_reviews.author: Pmg1

customer_reviews.title: Poor design - Can't get the phone to plug in
customer_reviews.text: Going in the trash can. I bought two of them, one for me and the wife. Neither of us can get the iPhone into the charger tail. Epic fail.
customer_reviews.author: eee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I can’t keep the watch straight but great for money and less wiring
customer_reviews.author: MHG

customer_reviews.title: Failed in a month - no help!
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a month and then the phone charging component quit. Return not allowed as of a few days ago!! That's hot garbage. Who wants to buy something for a hundred dollars, it quit a month later, and have no recourse?!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Haynie

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, and would not plug into the phone, even when it was adjusted all the way up. I suppose it may have worked if you took off your phone case every time you wanted to charge your phone, but that’s not convenient or practical.
customer_reviews.author: Grant S.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a pain to use. The lightning plug for the phone is flimsy and it’s difficult to get your phone to set on it properly. The watch part is fine but the phone charging part is very poorly designed. I would definitely return it if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: This worked well for about a year. Now it ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for about a year. Now it won’t charge my iPhone or iPad. The watch part still works though. For the money, I’d have expected it to work longer than it did.
customer_reviews.author: PredsFan118

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Bought in April, stopped working in July. For the high price it should last longer than 4 months. Great design but just not up to the task.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M. Seguin

customer_reviews.title: Abruptly stopped working
customer_reviews.text: All of a sudden the phone charging port stopped working. The watch charger still works- I have only had it for 3 months! What a shame because it was really working well. I definitely don’t recommend this charger!
customer_reviews.author: Mariann Dandison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this thing is really nice. perfect for charging apple products.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Porter

customer_reviews.title: ... than I wanted to spend but I am so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: It was a little more than I wanted to spend but I am so glad I did. 1 cord and I just dock my phone and watch in one place every night and I'm done, boom !
customer_reviews.author: fussbudget'smom

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $100
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could use it for charging my iPhone and watch at the same time. The charger worked great initially but suddenly stopped working about a year later. Of course it’s out of warranty, so no help on replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Denise King

product_meta.title: Belkin PowerHouse Charging Dock for Iphone XS, Max, XR, X, 8/Plus and More, Apple Watch 4, 3, 2, 1 (White)
product_meta.description: The valet charge Dock for Apple Watch + iPhone is the first dock to include an integrated Apple Watch charger. The dock uses the same Magnetic technology as the Apple Watch charging cable. Magnets align the connectors automatically, And inductive charging begins instantly. The dock also features an integrated Lightning connector for iPhone. With both connectors hardwired into the dock, charging your Apple Watch and iPhone simultaneously can be done with a single cable. The minimal design of the dock mirrors the look and feel of your devices, to provide an elegant dual-charging solution. This compact and high-performing Accessory will be an attractive addition to any space. Compatibility
feature_bullets: The Belkin difference: Pioneer in technology and innovation for over 35 years
Apple charging dock safely charges your Apple watch and iPhone at the same time
Works with iPhone XS, iPhone XS Max, iPhone XR running iOS 12.1 or later; compatible with iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X and previous iPhone models with Lightning connector
Includes built-in magnetic charging module for Apple Watch; Lightning connector for iPhone
Adjustable dial raises/lowers Lightning connector to fit most cases

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars679 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Belkin PowerHouse Charging Dock for iPhone XS, XS Max, XR, X, 8/8 Plus and more, Apple Watch 4, 3, 2, 1
